itunes:title: Episode 622 - Special Guest Mike The Cop
title: Episode 622 - Special Guest Mike The Cop
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back special guest Mike The Cop to get his take on the current movement that is pushing for police reform, he explains why it is pertinent that all cops must try to keep suspects safe even when it's extremely diffi...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back special guest Mike The Cop to get his take on the current movement that is pushing for police reform, he explains why it is pertinent that all cops must try to keep suspects safe even when it's extremely difficult, and he weighs in on the many ways being a police officer is going to become far more difficult as new laws and propositions are made or amended.
